head.title: Banana-Macadamia Nut Bread 2 Lb (Oster Bread Machine)

ing.item: Mashed bananas; very ripe, abt 2 med

directions.step:
1) Remove bread pan; attach kneading blade.
2) Place all ingredients in bread pan in order listed.
3) Insert bread pan, close lid and plug in.
4) Select bread type: Press select until the number 8 is displayed (Sweet Bread cycle).
5) Press start. Bread will be done baking in the number of hours indicated.
6) Add mix-ins when bread machine beeps, about 32 minutes after starting.
Rapid cycle not recommended. Don't use the delay bake option for this recipe.
I used pecans instead of macadamia nuts & it worked out ok.
This recipe came right to the glass when done, but it turned out ok.
NOTES : The bananas have to be *very* ripe, or it won't be sweet enough. (I didn't get them ripe enough when I made it). Recipe by: Oster Deluxe Bread and Dough Maker, p 40. (1997)
